translations: 形式，形态；程序；物理疗法；主要的感觉

sentences.sentence: They are researching a different modality of treatment for the disease.
sentences.translation: 他们正在研究这种疾病的另一种疗法。

sentences.sentence: Positron emission tomography (PET) is an emerging modality in lung cancer staging.
sentences.translation: 正电子放射断层造影术(PET)是新兴的适用于肺癌分期的检查方法。

sentences.sentence: The panel will then take another two years to evaluate the rates of success of each modality.
sentences.translation: 然后该小组将再花两年的时间来评估每种治疗的成功率。
